attributes.action: Fair pricing for alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at music festivals
attributes.background: We are calling for music festivals to sell water, soft drinks and alcoholic drinks at fair prices. At TRNSMT 2018, water is £2.50, a soft drink is £2.80, a pint of lager is £5.50 and a spirit and mixer is £6.00. This is not affordable for music fans and will encourage binge drinking beforehand.
